scene_target: Kaelen reaches the crater and discovers the pulsing shard.
goal: Investigate the impact site to find the source of the corruption.
conflict: The treacherous terrain of razor-sharp glass and the debilitating pain of his fractured Oath.
required_callbacks: The star impacted the Silver Valley, creating a crown of solidified glass.
The Starwrought Oath in Kaelen's marrow has physically fractured and turned dark.
end_condition: Kaelen secures the pulsing shard as the rhythmic beat intensifies.

recent_facts: Kaelen has reached the center of the starfall crater in the Silver Valley.
The Silver Valley has been transformed into a crown of razor-sharp solidified glass.
The Starwrought Oath is a physical pewter filament in Kaelen's marrow that has fractured into dark splinters.
Kaelen has secured the pulsing star-shard, which is now bound to his life force.
Shadow-forms are closing in on Kaelen's position at the impact site.

last_scene: Kaelen navigated the treacherous glass crown of the Silver Valley to reach the impact site.
He discovered a pulsing violet shard that reacted violently to the physical filament of his fractured Oath.
Kaelen claimed the shard, enduring a blinding metaphysical surge that bound the object to his marrow-bound magic.
key_events: Kaelen descended into the Silver Valley, now a sea of flash-melted glass.
The physical pewter filament of the Starwrought Oath ground into Kaelen's radius bone.
Kaelen reached the central crater and found the star-shard beating like a heart.
Proximity to the shard caused the fractured Oath to flare with necrotic purple light.
Kaelen touched the shard, experiencing visions of a dying galaxy and a cosmic beast.
Kaelen secured the shard in his satchel as shadow-forms began to hunt him.
must_stay_true: The Starwrought Oath is a physical pewter-colored filament woven into the marrow of the radius bone.
Magic and star-matter proximity cause physical frost-burn, scorched lungs, and metallic scents.
The starfall corruption is characterized by a rhythmic 'thump-hiss' and violet light.
The High Spire is in a state of catastrophic collapse and tilting.
The shard is now tied to Kaelen's life force and Oath-essence.
